headline.print_headline: How Well You Sleep May Hinge on Race
headline.main: How Well You Sleep May Hinge on Race

docs.abstract: Studies by sleep researchers suggest that non-Hispanic whites get more and better-quality sleep than people of other races, and blacks are the most likely to get shorter, more restless sleep; it remains uncertain whether the discrepancy is due to genetic or socioeconomic factors.
docs.lead_paragraph: Non-Hispanic whites get more and better-quality sleep than people of other races, and blacks are the most likely to get shorter, more restless sleep, studies have shown.
docs.snippet: Non-Hispanic whites get more and better-quality sleep than people of other races, and blacks are the most likely to get shorter, more restless sleep, studies have shown.

headline.seo: Do Argentines Need Therapy? Pull Up a Couch
headline.print_headline: Do Argentines Need Therapy? Pull Up a Couch
headline.main: Do Argentines Need Therapy? Pull Up a Couch

docs.abstract: Number of practicing psychologists in Argentina has been surging, making the country a world leader, at least when it comes to its people's broad willingness to bare their souls; theories abound as to why psychological hang-ups seem to be so prolific in the country.
docs.lead_paragraph: The number of practicing psychologists in Argentina has been surging, making the country a world leader, at least when it comes to people’s broad willingness to bare their souls.
docs.snippet: The number of practicing psychologists in Argentina has been surging, making the country a world leader, at least when it comes to people’s broad willingness to bare their souls.

headline.seo: Lawyers of Big Tobacco Lawsuits Take Aim at Food Industry
headline.print_headline: After Tobacco, Lawyers Set Their Sights on Food Industry
headline.main: Lawyers From Suits Against Big Tobacco Target Food Makers

docs.abstract: More than a dozen lawyers who took on the tobacco companies and won have filed 25 cases against food industry companies; suits claim that the companies are misleading consumers and violating federal regulations by wrongly labeling products and ingredients.
docs.lead_paragraph: More than a dozen lawyers who took on Big Tobacco have filed 25 cases asserting that manufacturers like ConAgra Foods and PepsiCo are misleading consumers and violating federal law.
docs.snippet: More than a dozen lawyers who took on Big Tobacco have filed 25 cases asserting that manufacturers like ConAgra Foods and PepsiCo are misleading consumers and violating federal law.

headline.main: Dr. George F. Cahill Jr., Diabetes Expert, Is Dead at 85

docs.abstract: Dr George F Cahill Jr, diabetes expert who made pivotal discoveries about the role of insulin in metabolism, dies at age 85. Photo (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. George F. Cahill Jr., a diabetes expert who made pivotal discoveries about the role of insulin in metabolism by studying research subjects on starvation diets, and who testified at Claus von Bülow's trials that he had tried to murder his wife with insulin, died on July 30 in Peterborough, N.H. He was 85.The cause was complications of pneumonia , his daughter Elizabeth Cahill Tiedemann said.
docs.snippet: Dr. George F. Cahill Jr., a  diabetes  expert who made pivotal discoveries about the role of insulin in metabolism by studying research subjects on starvation diets, and who testified at Claus von Bülow's trials that he had tried to murder his wife...

headline.seo: George F. Cahill Jr., Diabetes Expert, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Dr. George F. Cahill Jr., Diabetes Expert, Is Dead at 85
headline.main: George F. Cahill Jr., Diabetes Expert, Dies at 85

docs.abstract: Dr George F Cahill Jr, diabetes expert who made pivotal discoveries about the role of insulin in metabolism, dies at age 85.
docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Cahill clarified insulin’s role in metabolism by studying research subjects on starvation diets. He also testified for the prosecution at the trials of Claus von Bülow on charges of trying to murder his wife with insulin.
docs.snippet: Dr. Cahill clarified insulin’s role in metabolism by studying research subjects on starvation diets. He also testified for the prosecution at the trials of Claus von Bülow on charges of trying to murder his wife with insulin.

docs.lead_paragraph: 8 P.M. (CBS) TEACHERS ROCK PRESENTED BY WALMART AND 'WON'T BACK DOWN' -- A CONCERT AND CHARITY EVENT BENEFITING TEACHERS AND EDUCATION Garth Brooks, Carrie Underwood, Josh Groban (above) and others perform in honor of American educators at this event taped on Tuesday at the Nokia Theater in Los Angeles. A number of stars -- including Dave Grohl of the Foo Fighters, Usher, Adam Levine and James Valentine of Maroon 5, Meryl Streep, L L Cool J, Jack Black and Morgan Freeman -- talk about teachers who influenced their lives. The program also features clips from the forthcoming movie ''Won't Back Down,'' starring Viola Davis and Maggie Gyllenhaal, about two mothers determined to transform a failing urban school.8 P.M. (HGTV) HGTV GREEN HOME 2012 GIVEAWAY Monica Pedersen randomly draws the winner of an environmentally friendly, 2,300-square-foot farmhouse in the Atlanta area with three bedrooms, two-and-a-half baths and an open floor plan in a 900-acre community connected by walking paths.

headline.main: More Older Adults With Multiple Problems

docs.abstract: By 2010, 45 percent of adults over age 65 were coping with more than one chronic disease, the C.D.C. reports.
docs.snippet: By 2010, 45 percent of adults over age 65 were coping with more than one chronic disease, the C.D.C. reports.

headline.main: How Much Can Patients Learn in a 15-Minute Doctor Visit?

docs.abstract: An increasing number of doctors are scrambling to cover as many preventive recommendations as they can. Even so, patients and parents are often left confused and uninformed.
docs.snippet: An increasing number of doctors are scrambling to cover as many preventive recommendations as they can. Even so, patients and parents are often left confused and uninformed.

headline.seo: In Iowa, Deep-Fried Butter on a Stick
headline.print_headline: At the Fair, Do Calories on a Stick Count?
headline.main: At the Fair, Do Calories on a Stick Count?

docs.abstract: Iowa State Fair is a vast, sweet, savory, shameless wonderland full of battered treats, including deep-fried butter on a stick; this year’s exotic new food is the deep-fried pickle dawg, which involves a pickle slice, pastrami or ham and cream cheese; attempts by its creators to put it on a stick and keep it there were disappointing, so it is served in a cardboard boat.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Iowa State Fair is a vast, sweet, savory, shameless wonderland full of battered treats — including deep-fried butter on a stick.
docs.snippet: The Iowa State Fair is a vast, sweet, savory, shameless wonderland full of battered treats — including deep-fried butter on a stick.
